EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne Tour_PARENT_2019.InterestEmail
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration for SpringOne Tour is open!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest!
We noticed that you have expressed interest in attending SpringOne Tour{{lead.PCF Workshop City}}.
We have now opened registration and are looking forward to seeing you in {{lead.PCF Workshop City}} !
Register here <[[{{my.CityPage}}]]>
If you have any other questions, please feel free to email SpringOneTour@pivotal.io <[[mailto:SpringOneTour@pivotal.io]]>.
Thanks, Tasha Isenberg and the SpringOne Tour Team
